title: Xfinity or UVerse?
body:
comcast or at&t which one would give me better internet?

EDIT: Crap I forgot to put a poll.

replies.body: It really depends on how you quantify **"better"**. Better as in, *lower latency* in League, or faster download speeds? A lot of that can be used to determine what service is a better choice for you.
basically something that'll give me 90 to 20 fps, or lower of course.

As *Wolfess* mentioned, you're likely meaning 20-90ms of latency. This will vastly depend on their specific network routing from the location you intend to reside while using their service. It's fairly difficult to test this, so I recommend reaching out to others in the neighborhood who play League and see what they say.

> [{quoted}](name=Astrophel,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=UVo9AhvX,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-10-14T04:57:32.409+0000)
>
> basically something that'll give me 90 to 20 fps, or lower of course.

I think you mean ms, which stands for milliseconds, and is used to determine the latency of connections. 1000 milliseconds  = 1 second.

fps = frames per second, or how fast your computer is able to refresh the images displayed. More frames per second = smoother image since it will display any changes faster
